Comment 42: 
listening on privilege ports on linux needs not the full root, but only
a single capabilities(8) called CAP_NET_BIND_SERVICE.

you can grant any capability on any executable file by using the setcap(8)
command.

e.g.:
sudo setcap cap_net_bind_service=+ep go_server

and then you can run go_server as a normal user (e.g. nobody).
